author: Sreeju Sudhakaran
title: Donald Trump calls Meryl Streep ‘over-rated’ on Twitter and gets trolled by her fans in response
text: Donald Trump calls Meryl… Donald Trump calls Meryl Streep ‘over-rated’ on Twitter and gets trolled by her fans in response US President Elect, Donald Trump is not the one who prefers silent treatment when it comes to giving back to people who just took a dig at him. During the recently held Golden Globe Awards 2017, Meryl By Sreeju Sudhakaran | Published: January 9, 2017 7:13 pm
